text: Vladimir Viktorovich Tsyplakov (; April 18, 1969 - December 14, 2019) was a Belarusian professional ice hockey player winger. He was drafted in the third round, 59th overall, by the Los Angeles Kings in the 1995 NHL Entry Draft. Tsyplakov was also an assistant coach with the Belarus men's national ice hockey team.http://www.eliteprospects.com/staff.php?staff=4054 ==International Statistics== Year Team Event GP G A Pts PIM 1989 Soviet Union WJC 7 1 0 1 8 1998 Belarus OG 5 1 1 2 2 1999 Belarus WC 6 2 2 4 2 2000 Belarus WC 5 3 2 5 4 2002 Belarus OG 8 1 3 4 4 2002 Belarus WC D1 5 9 9 18 4 2003 Belarus WC 6 3 1 4 2 2004 Belarus WC D1 5 5 2 7 0 2005 Belarus WC 6 0 4 4 2 Senior Tier I totals Senior Tier I totals Senior Tier I totals 36 10 13 23 16 Senior Tier II totals Senior Tier II totals Senior Tier II totals 10 14 11 25 4 ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Buffalo Sabres players Category:Los Angeles Kings players Category:Belarusian ice hockey players
